import React from 'react' import { MDBCard,MDBCardHeader, MDBCardBody, MDBCardTitle, MDBBtn, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBIcon, MDBContainer, MDBCardFooter} from 'mdbreact'; function CommentBox() { return ( <>
setFormData({...formData, company: e.target.value})} className="form-control form-control-alternative" placeholder="Enter the Company Name" />
Interview at Google
 ) } export default CommentBox
